name: Kled
title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
i_displayname: Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard / Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2 / Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3
q_displayname: Beartrap on a Rope / Pocket Pistol

i.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
i.description:
Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.

While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

q.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
q.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

w.name: Violent Tendencies
w.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

e.name: Jousting
e.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.

r.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
r.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

i1.blurb: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts. While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.
i1.cooldown: {{tt|30 (On-Mount)|Cooldown begins on mounting-up and not when Skaarl flees away.}}
i1.cooldownBurn: {{tt|30 (On-Mount)|Cooldown begins on mounting-up and not when Skaarl flees away.}}
description: '''Kled''' is accompanied by his semi-trusty mount, '''Skaarl'''. Whether '''Kled''' is {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||mounted}} or {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismounted}}, his abilities are altered. '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' each have independent health bars with '''Skaarl''' being the only one benefiting from {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}}.

{{sbc|Mounted – Innate:}} While mounted all damage dealt to the duo is suffered by '''Skaarl'''. After being reduced to {{as|{{sti|health|0 health}}}} '''Skaarl''' flees and '''Kled''' {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismounts}}, cleansing himself of all {{tip|crowd control}} and briefly becoming {{tip|untargetable}}, with every damage in excess of '''Skaarl's''' {{as|{{sti|health}}}} being ignored.

{{sbc|Dismounted – Innate:}} '''Kled''' has {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|340+70*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} '''base''' health}}}}, gains {{sti|range|125 range}} but his {{sti|ms|{{as|'''base''' movement speed}}}} is reduced by 60. While moving towards enemy {{tip|champions}} within {{tt|900|estimated}} range he gains {{pp|100 to 185|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} but his basic attacks against them deal {{as|80% AD}} damage. Additionally, he gains the ability to restore '''Skaarl's''' {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3||Courage}} to {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||reunite}} again.

{{sbc|Courage - Innate:}} '''Kled''' restores 20 '''Courage''' whenever a champion he damaged dies within 3 seconds, 4 '''Courage''' for minion kills, 5 '''Courage''' when damaging a structure or epic monster, and 15 '''Courage''' when damaging an enemy champion. At 100 '''Courage''', '''Skaarl''' returns to the fight with {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|4|key=%|50 to 80|1 to 16}} of '''Skaarl's''' '''maximum''' health}}}}. While in base 25 '''Courage''' is regenerated every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. {{si|Recall|Returning to the base}} fully restores '''Skaarl's''' '''Courage''' and {{as|{{sti|health}}}}. If reuniting outside of base, '''Skaarl''' gets '''Frayed Nerves''', meaning '''Kled''' will not be able to restore '''Skaarl's''' '''Courage''' for a brief period of time.
{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||Mounting}} or {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismounting}} resets all of '''Kled's''' basic ability {{sti|cooldowns}} except for {{ai|Violent Tendencies|Kled}}.
i1.name: Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard
notes: * [[Decoy]]s are counted as champions for all of this ability's effects.
* '''Kled's''' health is rounded up while '''Skaarl's''' is rounded down.
* The movement speed reduction is not affected by [[slow resist]].
* {{ii|Gargoyle Stoneplate}} can increase '''Kled's''' base health.
* It is possible to get the '''Courage''' from base but have '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' reunite out of base.
* Health regeneration only regenerates '''Kled's''' or '''Skaarl's''' health, and not both's.

riot.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
riot.description:
Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.

While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

riot.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
riot.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
riot.tooltip:
Kled throws a bear trap that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large monster hit, granting True Sight. Deals 150% damage to minions passed through.

If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for {{ e3 }} seconds, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*2 }}) physical damage, yanks the enemy toward him, and slows the enemy by {{ e5 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Dismounted: Becomes Pocket Pistol, a ranged ability that restores courage.

q1.blurb: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||Mounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' hurls a beartrap tied to a piece of rope in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies it passes through and attaching itself to the first enemy [[champion]] or large monster hit, granting {{tip|true sight}} of them. [[Minion]]s and small monsters take 50% increased damage.

If '''Kled''' remains within a slowly decreasing radius of his target for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, he {{tip|airborne|pulls}} them {{tt|100|Estimated}} units towards him, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Beartrap Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 130}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minions and Small Monsters Damage|{{ap|30*1.5 to 130*1.5}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

{{st|Yank Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 260}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|30+60 to 130+260}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
q1.name: Beartrap on a Rope
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block ''Beartrap on a Rope's'' initial throw, but not its subsequent damage or pull.

riot.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
riot.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
riot.tooltip:
Kled throws a bear trap that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large monster hit, granting True Sight. Deals 150% damage to minions passed through.

If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for {{ e3 }} seconds, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*2 }}) physical damage, yanks the enemy toward him, and slows the enemy by {{ e5 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Dismounted: Becomes Pocket Pistol, a ranged ability that restores courage.

q2.blurb: When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||Dismounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' sprays a hail of five pellets in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies that intercept the pellets, and {{tip|dash|dashing}} 250 units in the opposite direction.

Enemies hit take only 20% damage per pellet beyond the first, and each pellet that hits an enemy champion or epic monster restores {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3|Kled|Courage}}, by 5 and {{fd|2.5}} respectively.
'''Kled''' periodically stores ammo, up to a maximum of 2 stored at once. '''Kled''' will store ammo even while {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|mounted}}.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|35 to 95}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|35*1.8 to 95*1.8}} {{as|(+ 144% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q2.name: Pocket Pistol
notes: * The knockback from ''Pocket Pistol'' can be used to pass through terrain.
* Casting Q during Kled's dismounting animation will buffer ''Pocket Pistol'' to cast when Kled lands. Casting Q during Kled's remounting animation will fire ''Pocket Pistol'' normally.

riot.name: Violent Tendencies
riot.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: When Kled basic attacks, he frenzies, gaining {{ e2 }}% attack speed for four attacks or {{ e6 }} seconds. Violent Tendencies then goes on cooldown.

The fourth hit deals bonus physical damage equal to {{ e4 }} plus {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum health (maximum {{ e7 }} vs monsters).

w1.blurb: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically enters a frenzy that grants him {{sti|attack speed|{{as|150% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds after the first, with the final attack dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{tt|{{as|(+ {{ap|4.5 to 6.5}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|capped at 200 against monsters}}}}
w1.name: Violent Tendencies
notes: * The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal but the damage from Violent Tendencies is unaffected.
* As with most on-hit physical damage, ''Violent Tendencies'' bonus damage will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
* The base bonus damage will affect structures.

riot.name: Jousting
riot.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
riot.tooltip:
Kled dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path. Cannot cross walls.

If Jousting hits an enemy champion or large monster, Kled gains {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} second and True Sight of the target. He can cast this ability again within {{ e6 }} seconds to dash back through the same target, dealing the same damage.

e1.blurb: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||'''Mounted'''|link=Kled#Mounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} minions and small monsters towards him. This cannot cross terrain.

Upon hitting an enemy champion or large monster '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash}} a {{tt|fixed distance|200 units, estimated}} through them, marking them for 3 seconds and gaining {{tip|true sight}} of them. At the end of the {{tip|dash}} '''Kled''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|50% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second and the ability to ''{{tip|dash|joust}}'' through the marked target again. This subsequent pass can cross terrain.
The mark will remain even if the target dies.
e1.name: Jousting
notes: * ''Jousting's'' second dash will end prematurely if '''Kled''' leaves the dash range or is dismounted.
* If '''Kled''' re-casts the ability at its maximum range, it will go on cooldown without activating.
e1.target_range: {{tt|550|first dash}} / {{tt|700|second dash, center to edge, estimated}}

riot.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
riot.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
riot.tooltip:
Kled charges toward a location, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing movement speed. While charging, Kled gains a shield that increases over time to a maximum of {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and lasts for 2 seconds after the charge ends.

Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing up to {{ f5 }}% (+{{ f1*3 }}%) of the target's maximum health as physical damage based on distance traveled.

r1.blurb: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||'''Mounted'''|link=Kled#Mounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' charge {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} towards the target location, automatically navigating terrain along the way.

While charging the duo gain increasingly {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{sti|shield}} for every {{fd|0.25}} seconds of traveling, maxing after 3 seconds and {{fd|2.25}} seconds respectively, up to a movement speed of {{tt|{{as|950|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}}. The shield lasts for 2 seconds upon finishing the charge.

{{sbc|{{ai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!||Mr. Kled's Wild Ride:}}}} The duo trails a directional draft in their wake for 9 seconds that grants a movement speed of {{tt|{{as|650|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}} to all allied champions who follow their lead.

'''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash|homes}} in on the first enemy champion encountered, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} {{tt|100|Estimated}} units and dealing them {{as|physical damage}}, increased by 8% for every {{fd|0.16}} seconds of traveling, up to a maximum increase of 200% after 4 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4 to 6 3}}% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4*3 to 6*3 3}}% {{as|(+ 12% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
r1.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
notes: * During the charge the duo gain:
** (950{{minus}}({{tt|'''current''' movement speed|after movement speed soft caps}})){{divided by}}12{{times}}(time{{divided by}}{{fd|0.25}}) {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}
** ('''maximum''' shield){{divided by}}10{{times}}((time{{plus}}{{fd|0.25}}){{divided by}}{{fd|0.25}}) shield
* The bonus movement speed is not affected by [[movement speed|movement speed caps]].
* The charge will not give any movement speed to '''Kled''' if he has more than {{tt|1440|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* The trail will not give '''Kled''' and his allies any movement speed if they have more than {{tt|840|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* All sections of the trail provide the same movement speed.
* Giving enough damage to make ''Kled'' dismount will cancel ''Chaaaaaaaarge!!!''.
* Enemies gain vision of ''Kled'' when he charges nearby.
